title: Peer Support Circles
description: Weekly virtual groups moderated by trained volunteers.
details: Our peer support circles meet every week online, guided by trained volunteers who foster safe and inclusive discussions. Participants share experiences and encourage one another through challenges.

title: Mentorship Matches
description: Career mentors by field and region (coming soon).
details: We’re building a mentorship network where you’ll be paired with someone in your field of study or career path, offering guidance, encouragement, and real-world advice.

title: Local Resource Map
description: Find nearby shelters, clinics, and training hubs.
details: Our interactive map highlights shelters, wellness clinics, and training centers in your area. It’s constantly updated to make sure you have access to safe and trusted resources.
